title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 29.2 - Computation of net profits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 29.2 - Computation of net profits

State Regulations
A bank or trust company must reduce net profits at the time a
provision for loan losses is made rather than when any net losses are charged
to the loan loss reserve. Accordingly, net profits of a bank or trust company
will equal its net income for purposes of Banking Law, section
112. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
29.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
